column4: cool upgrade is taking about 3 hours to complete :@ that will be 5 am here ...
it depends on your inter-speed ;)
already downloaded, install is taking 3 hours
did you upgrade before the distro upgrade?
yes
so you have loads of things installed :)
seems true :p ~1900 packages to upgrade :D
not too much .. :0
than it's just my 5400 rpm hdd I think (+ 1.8 ghz dualcore)
let it go, don't interrupt or you might get screwed
yes I'm afraid of that, probably will just leave it running while sleeping :)
yes. hopefully you don't have any pop-up prompts in meanwhile
I'll freak out if I get up and it still says 2h to go, do you want to do that and that ;D
just sleep well and don't have bad dreams about the end of the world :p
I'll try, thanks :)
don't play with grub while upgrading... go to sleep :p
:D and then I'll wake up and my grub is destroyed *fears* :D
SHIFT before loading ubuntu and just hit 'update grub' on the recovery menu, just in case
thanks a lot
but don't worry about that now.
I don't worry that much I think, it should all go well (says the optimist)
hehehe
